Description: category. The number on the left side of the name is the priority when multiple action buttons overlap (the closer it is to 0
Minimum: the higher the priority is displayed).

Description: Specify the Damipoli ID that is the center of the bottom of the range. If there is no Damipoly or -1 is entered
Minimum: the center coordinates will be the reference.

Description: Used only when the range type is a capsule. Additional Damipoly (capsule) that creates a line segment with two Damipoly
How much to raise or lower the Y coordinate of the bottom (cylinder / prism)
If there is no Damipoli that specifies the Damipoli ID that will be the position of the action spot
Maximum: the center coordinates will be the reference.

Minimum: the action button will not appear when riding and no judgment will be made.

DisplayName: Is it gray out when riding?
Minimum: the action button will be grayed out when riding and no judgment will be made.
the action button will not appear when crouching
Maximum: and no judgment will be made.

DisplayName: Is it gray out when crouching?
Minimum: the action button will be grayed out when crouching and no judgment will be made.

DisplayName: Replacement action button ID when riding
